IRS990.MissionDesc: FULLERTON FAMILY FOUNDATION ("FFF") IS A CALIFORNIA NONPROFIT PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION ORGANIZED AS A SUPPORTING ORGANIZATION OF THE MARIN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION ("MCF"). FFF ENGAGES IN CHARITABLE ACTIVITIES WHICH ARE CONSISTENT WITH THE CHARITABLE PURPOSES OF MCF. MCF'S MISSION IS TO ENCOURAGE AND APPLY PHILANTHROPIC CONTRIBUTIONS TO HELP IMPROVE THE HUMAN CONDITION, EMBRACE DIVERSITY, PROMOTE A HUMANE AND DEMOCRATIC SOCIETY, AND ENHANCE THE COMMUNITY'S QUALITY OF LIFE, NOW AND FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS.
IRS990.Desc: DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2018, THE FULLERTON FAMILY FOUNDATION DISTRIBUTED 45 GRANTS TOTALING $2,499,036 TO SUPPORT CHARITABLE PROGRAMS AT QUALIFIED PUBLIC CHARITIES.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: AMBASSADORS OF HOPE AND OPPORTUNITY PROJECT
EAST BAY CENTER FOR THE PERFORMING ARTS

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT EDU PROG, COL SCHOLAR FOR GIRLS
SUPPORT GO PUBLIC SCHOOL FAMILY LEADERS

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HAMILTON ELEMENTARY SCHOOLNOVATO UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORT MUS ED:CHILDREN IN EXT POVERTY
SUPPORT THEATER INSTR FOR LOW-INC YOUTH
SUPPORT THINK COLLEGE NOW SCI PROGRAM

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: WEST CONTRA COSTA UNIFIED SCHOOL DISTRICT

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO QUALIFY FOR A GRANT DISTRIBUTION FROM THE FOUNDATION A GRANTEE MUST BE ABLE TO SATISFY THE FOUNDATION'S DUE DILIGENCE REQUIREMENTS. THIS PROCESS INCLUDES MAKING AN INDEPENDENT INVESTIGATION OF THE PROSPECTIVE GRANTEE TO ESTABLISH THAT IT QUALIFIES TO RECEIVE THE GRANT. THE GRANTEE ORGANIZATION MUST ALSO HAVE THE CAPACITY TO FULFILL THE TERMS OF THE GRANT AND BE WILLING TO FURNISH THE FOUNDATION WITH ANY REQUIRED EVALUATIVE REPORTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JOHN FULLERTON (TRUSTEE) AND JESSICA FULLERTON (TRUSTEE) HAVE A MARITAL RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION HAS 2 CLASSES OF DIRECTORS THAT EACH CAN APPOINT DIRECTORS PER SECTION 3.2 OF THE BYLAWS: THE MARIN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION (MCF) CLASS AND THE DONOR CLASS. THE MCF CLASS APPOINTED DIRECTORS ALWAYS HOLD A MAJORITY OF THE BOARD SEATS. THE CURRENT BOARD HAS 3 MCF CLASS DIRECTORS AND 2 DONOR CLASS DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER AND VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE FOR REVIEW BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BOARD, OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES MUST ANNUALLY REVIEW THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND COMPLETE A QUESTIONNAIRE CONCERNING COMPLIANCE AND DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS. THE FORMS ARE REVIEWED BY THE CORPORATE SECRETARY AND CFO TO ENSURE ONGOING COMPLIANCE AND TO DETERMINE WHETHER A CONFLICT EXISTS. ALL CONFLICTS AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE REQUIRED TO BE DISCLOSED, AND THE PERSON IS EXCLUDED FROM PARTICIPATING IN DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS CONCERNING THE MATTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FULLERTON FAMILY FOUNDATION (THE FOUNDATION) DOES NOT HAVE ANY PAID STAFF. IF THE FOUNDATION WERE TO HIRE EXECUTIVE STAFF IT WOULD FOLLOW THE POLICIES AND PROCEDURES OF ITS PARENT ORGANIZATION, THE MARIN COMMUNITY FOUNDATION (MCF). MCF'S TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL'S COMPENSATION PACKAGE IS REVIEWED AND DECIDED ANNUALLY BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. A COMPENSATION COMMITTEE COMPRISED OF SEVERAL INDEPENDENT MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS IS ESTABLISHED ANNUALLY. EVERY FEW YEARS, THE COMMITTEE ENGAGES AN INDEPENDENT EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION CONSULTANT TO EVALUATE THE PRESIDENT'S COMPENSATION PACKAGE TO DETERMINE IF THE COMPONENTS, AS WELL AS THE PACKAGE AS A WHOLE, CONTINUE TO BE FAIR AND REASONABLE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
NO CHANGES TO THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OVERSIGHT PROCESS.
